subject: Important Tax Notice - Action Required
body:
Dear Taxpayer,

NOTICE: CP2000

Our records indicate a discrepancy in your 2023 tax return (Form 1040).

Reference Number: 123-45-6789-2023
Tax Period: 2023
Amount Due: $1,245.00

You have 30 days to respond to this notice. You may:
1. Agree with the proposed changes
2. Disagree and provide documentation
3. Request additional time

Failure to respond may result in additional penalties and interest.

Internal Revenue Service
Department of the Treasury
